snippet.title: Cryptid - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Cryptid is a single-player horror fps game that chronicles an experienced hunter and a creature's encounter from the perspective of the Body Cam. Please don't forget to add Cryptid to your wishlist and join our Discord server for support us.

Cryptid's Website
https://www.influx.games/

#cryptid  #steamgame #horrorgaming #indiegame #comingsoon
